speaker: left
text: There's a member of the Elemental Offense Squad at a village we'll be passing by.

speaker: left
text: It will be important that we have enough power to stop any evil which may be at The Nation of Altar.
???: So, you guys are heading to Altar?
???: I just finished a mission in Quad so I'll be able to help you if you need it.
???: Alright then, I'll be heading back to Static.

speaker: left
text: We're almost at Altar, but there's some bandits up ahead.
